measures.description: Limited lockdown, contact ban, limiting non-essential economy to home office

description: Obligatory use of face masks in public transport and retail
＋ Obligatory use of face masks in schools (except during lessons)
＋ Obligatory use of face masks in offices and administrative buildings (except at desk)
＋ Obligatory use of face masks in secondary schools even during lessons
Conducting PCR tests in meat-processing facilities
Limited lockdown, closing restaurants and non-essential businesses with customer interaction
Limited lockdown, contact ban, limiting non-essential economy to home office
Partially lifted lockdown restrictions, re-opening non-essential businesses with customer interaction
Limited lockdown, contact ban, curfew at night, stepwise applying/lifting of restrictions based on 7-day incidence
Vaccination started with prioritization by age and risk group
Vaccination priorization abolished; vaccination quota of 69% reached for age group 80+
